name: Nyoom (Shayliebug)
description:
The title Nyoom! comes from a variation of the word "zoom". Having frequented the term, it was the first thing that came to mind for this project. The mechanics were largely inspired by Temple Run or Subway Surfer type games, but far more simplified.

This project was submitted for my midterm project for Mobile Game Development ID119 with Professor Foster at Butler Community College in Fall 2020.
